wikipedia_page.main: Timothy Graham (1958 – 6 September 2015) was from Holloway, London of Irish/Scots parentage and the son of John Graham. In his own right, he was a British, RTS Award-winning TV Producer, journalist, former television presenter, chairman and founder of Soho-based Fin London.

response: * Wired, 1988 TV series produced by  Tim Graham
* Tim Graham (sports journalist), American sports journalist
* Tim Graham (TV producer) (1958–2015), British journalist, television presenter and producer
* Tim Graham (Home and Away), a fictional character from the Australian soap opera Home and Away
* Tim Graham, director of media analysis at the Media Research Center
